title: Akron Beacon Journal - Wikipedia
snippet: The Akron Beacon Journal is a morning newspaper in Akron, Ohio, United States. Owned by Gannett, it is the sole daily newspaper in Akron and is distributed throughout Northeast Ohio. The paper's coverage focuses on local news.

title: Beacon Journal owner GateHouse Media acquires Gannett
snippet: GateHouse Media, the company that owns the Akron Beacon Journal and nine other Ohio newspapers, on Monday announced its long-planned acquisition of Gannett, creating the nationâ€™s largest newspaper chain.

title: Akron Beacon Journal newspaper in Akron Ohio - MondoTimes.com
snippet: The Akron Beacon Journal is a daily newspaper in Akron, Ohio USA owned by Gannett Company, Inc.

title: Akron Beacon Journal 2025 Company Profile: Valuation, Investors, Acquisition | PitchBook
snippet: Akron Beacon Journal was acquired by Gannett Company.

title: Help Center - Akron Beacon Journal
snippet: As a subscriber, you can schedule temporary holds by visiting account.beaconjournal.com, chat online with an agent by clicking on the link below, or calling Customer Service (phone number and service hours are below). A temporary hold can be set up for up to 30 days through our automated system.
